name: Beloved Princess
description:
You are a lovely knight who travel to a castle to bring back the princess.  Find her and return to the beginning of the level, but be careful, something might have changed...

The game containts 3 levels, 1 original music made by Oathr.

Made in 19h41 minutes spread over two days, thanks for my twitch chat helping me during this experience :)

Don't hesitate to rate or leave a comment !

If you really enjoy it, make sure to follow me "MrAlgost" on the internet.
